projects.name: JourneyPal
projects.description: A PC based web-app creates personalised travel itineraries based on user input (days, budget, location) using OpenAI API along with Translator API that enables language translation for global travellers. Enhancing accessibility and user experience.

projects.name: Anomalous-Human-Activity-Detection System
projects.description: An AI-driven surveillance solution that uses computer vision to automatically identify abnormal activities in crowded areas, improving security with real-time monitoring and motion analysis.

projects.name: CabRental
projects.description: A PC based web-app is a full-stack website catering to university students, facilitating affordable cab booking and partnering services, powered by HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.

experiences.company_name: RCMA - DRDO, MINISTRY OF DEFENCE, GOVT. OF INDIA
experiences.description: Enhanced organizations official website for better user experience and features. Observed manufacturing processes and quality control during on-site visits at the hangar. Enhanced internal email communication by implementing a personal SMTP server.
Resolved bugs for smooth user experience. Mentored and led a team of 20 interns for collaboration. Integrated Firebase for website notifications.
Coordinated project tasks and managed timelines with Contributors.
Efficiently managed websites, improved user experiences through data-driven enhancements, and collaborated with developers.
Managed and redesigned website interfaces for over 5+ web projects.

full_output.name: Sumit Kumar
